drilled holes in it

connected it all with one shackle bolt
then i attached four chains to a

i can just leave the thing out here or i

oh we got the roof stake down really
tight which is important because when it
snows the weight of that snow will make
the roof sag inward and then the snow
and water won't drain off the roof and
it gets saggier and saggier until it
collapses if you keep the roof really
tight that snow will slide off and then
you'll have a good solid roof
i got about a one foot awning on both
sides of the cabin now that'll go a long

the mud and from seeping inside the
walls
that's boiling up nicely
next i need to build a fire in the
